about_the_game:
RUINWAKER DEMO

Blast, Climb, and Discover a world of action with our Sci-Fi VR demo of RuinWaker! In the demo you will find a section of the first campaign level and a test room for exploring the early features of RuinWaker's combat and mobility.

STORY CAMPAIGN

Follow in the footsteps of Grant Gavis, a novice member of A.R.C.H.S. ( AKA the Archeological Recording of Cosmic History Society. ), as he finds an ancient power of galactic potential. What will Grant have to do to make sure that what he's found doesn't fall into the wrong hands?

THE FUTURE

This is just the beginning for RuinWaker. We want to expand with a full campaign, cohesive multiplayer maps and game modes, and to include a PVE 4 player CO-OP. Keep an eye out for updates!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.5ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus PC and Index only. Oculus Touch controllers and Index Knuckles
  • Additional Notes: Operates with SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Hexa-Core 3.6ghz+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus PC and Index only. Oculus Touch controllers and Index Knuckles
  • Additional Notes: Operates with SteamVR

short_description: The World of RUINWAKER is filled with lost treasures and trinkets to find. Explore as Grant Gavis, a novice member of A.R.C.H.S. ( Otherwise known as the Archeological Recording of Cosmic History Society. ) Can he prevent an ancient power that he's uncovered from falling into the wrong hands?
